This might be because the mobile phone number you registered with FordPass doesn\'t match the record in the dealer\'s system or your vehicle hasn\'t been serviced at the dealer.\n\nPlease contact your dealer to update car owner\'s information or call Guides to get more assistance.

Automatically receive Vehicle Health Reports in your email inbox at the cadence you choose

FordPass™ already gives you access to some great services. More benefits and rewards will be available soon, so watch this space.
As a FordPass member, the journey is more rewarding when you take advantage of everything FordPass has to offer.
FordPass recognizes you with Perks for activities as simple as completing your profile. Instructions for redeeming your Perks will be sent to your in app message center!
FordPass celebrates the milestones you reach along your journey. The more you use the app, the more you will see your rewards grow.
Sorry, we\'re having trouble connecting to FordPass. Please try again later.
Make the journey worth your while.
Take advantage of features like Park and My Vehicles to unlock badges.
Check your email for Perks you may earn throughout your journey.
It\'s our way of thanking you for moving smarter with us.
FordPass helps you get more out of your Ford ownership experience. Add your Ford VIN to My Vehicles to unlock this badge.
Your badge for becoming a FordPass member. Thank you for moving smarter with us.
Enjoy a more seamless service experience — Assign a preferred dealer in My Dealer to unlock this badge.
You unlocked this badge by assigning a preferred dealer. Sometimes it\'s OK to play favorites, but remember, you can change your preferred dealer any time.
You earned this badge by adding your Ford VIN to My Vehicles to get more out of your Ford ownership experience.
Add a Card to My Wallet
Enjoy a faster and easier way to pay for parking when you add a payment method to My Wallet. You\'ll unlock this badge just for getting set up!
Use FordPass Park to reserve and park to unlock this badge.
You earned this badge the first time you used FordPass Park to reserve and park.
Reserve and park 4 times to make your way to Park Level 1.
You\'re moving your way up — You reserved and parked 4 times.
Reserve and park 8 times to make your way to Park Level 2.
You reserved and parked 8 times. If there was a VIP list, you\'d be on it!
Be among the first to try FordPass
Are you enjoying the faster and easier way to pay for parking? You unlocked this badge by setting up a payment method in My Wallet.
You\'ve unlocked 1 badge. Tap on the badge below to find out how to get your digital perk.
You\'ve unlocked %d badges. Keep your journey going and earn them all.
Congrats on unlocking all 7 badges! Keep checking back - we\'ll add new badges in the future.
Find Stations That Fit Your Needs
Find gas stations that fulfill all your preferences and needs.
Have a go-to station? Want to remember that one that always has the best snacks? Save all your favorites in one convenient place.

For your safety, you cannot access the app until you disconnect. Please keep your Bluetooth paired — we\'re updating vehicle health data so you can access your vehicle\'s fuel level, mileage and vehicle health alerts.
Disconnect your phone from the Bluetooth connection, then reconnect and wait for the FordPass *fordpass_icon* icon to appear.
If You Don\'t See the Ford Pass Icon
Stay on Top of Your Vehicle\'s Needs
Access your vehicle\'s fuel level, mileage and the most up-to-date health alerts when you enable SYNC® AppLink®.
To get vehicle health information, follow a few simple steps to connect your vehicle to FordPass using SYNC® AppLink®.

Your vehicle\'s air filter restriction gauge has reached the "change filter" mark due to blockage in the air intake system. The air filter condition should be verified by inspecting the underhood restriction gauge; the message is only a secondary indicator. Always use the underhood restriction gauge to determine when the air filter element needs to be changed. Please consult your Owner\'s Manual for more information or contact your authorized dealer for assistance.

There is a potential issue with your vehicle\'s starting security system or your vehicle key\'s battery. If "Starting System Fault" is displayed, your vehicle will not start; please contact your authorized dealer as soon as possible. If "Key Battery Low" is displayed, please change the key\'s battery as soon as possible. Please consult your Owner\'s Manual for more information or contact your authorized dealer for assistance.
Your vehicle\'s windshield washer fluid is low. Please refer to your owner\'s manual for instructions on how to add more fluid or contact an authorized dealer for assistance.
Your vehicle is low on fuel. (Please refer to the Fuel and Refuelling chapter in your Owner\'s Manual for more information.)

If the Anti-Theft Indicator flashes rapidly or illuminates steadily with ignition turned on, switch the ignition off, then back on to make sure there is no electronic interference with the programmed key. If the vehicle does not start, please try to start it with your spare key and, if successful, contact your authorized dealer for a key replacement. if the indicator still flashes rapidly or is illuminated steadily and your vehicle does not start, please contact your authorized dealer as soon as possible for service. Please refer to your Owner\'s Manual for more information.

One or more of the following may have occurred in your vehicle\'s air suspension system: the load limit may have been exceeded, the system may have been turned off or the system may require servicing. Please consult your Owner\'s Manual for more information or contact an authorized dealer for assistance.
TC, IVD, or RSC OFF Indication
There may be a malfunction with your vehicle\'s Stability Control system. Please refer to your owner\s manual or contact an authorized dealer for more information.

In extremely cold weather (typically around -15°F (-26°C)), if the engine block heater is not utilized, the engine will not respond to accelerator pedal movement for 30 seconds. This is done so engine oil can be properly circulated to avoid engine damage from lack of lubrication. A timer will begin a countdown from 30 seconds. Once the counter has reached 0 seconds, OK TO DRIVE displays and the engine will then respond to accelerator pedal movement. Please consult your Owner\'s Manual for more information or contact your authorized dealer for assistance.

Your vehicle\'s exhaust filter is full of exhaust soot particles and the vehicle needs to be operated in a manner to allow automatic cleaning. This message will stay on until the exhaust filter cleaning has begun, at which time the Cleaning Exhaust Filter message is displayed. When this occurs, drive the vehicle above 30 mph (48 km/h) for at least 20 minutes until the Cleaning Exhaust Filter message turns off. This message is normal and does not indicate a malfunction. Please consult your Owner\'s Manual for more information or contact your authorized dealer for assistance.

With the key turned to the on position, the Glow Plug Pre-Heat Indicator illuminates if glow plug heat is necessary as a starting aid. Wait until the light goes off before starting. Refer to your Owner\'s Manual or Owner\'s Manual Diesel Supplement. The glow plugs will continue to be activated for two minutes after the glow plug pre-heat indicator has turned off. The light should always illuminate at least momentarily when the engine is cold and the ignition is turned to on. If it does not illuminate the glow plug system should be checked and repaired promptly to avoid difficulty in cold starting. Contact your authorized dealer as soon as possible. Please consult your Owner\'s Manual for more information.
Please enter a valid mobile number.
Please enter a valid postal code.
Please enter a valid postal code.
We\'ll remember this information next time, but you can edit it anytime in your account settings.
Sorry, we were unable to verify the information provided. Please double check your information and try again, or contact a Guide for help.
Make this my default payment method
Place red line over barcode to scan.
That VIN is already in your vehicles.
Vin not detected. Please try again.
Where can I find my VIN?

The All Wheel Drive (AWD) system has turned off. This may be due to an overheating AWD system or the installation of the compact spare tire. AWD will resume operating once one or both of these conditions are rectified. If neither applies, please contact your authorized dealer. Please see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.
All Wheel Drive OFF or 4X4 OFF
The anti-lock brake system has detected a malfunction. Please contact your authorized dealer ASAP.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

If BLIND SPOT SYSTEM FAULT or CROSS TRAFFIC SYSTEM FAULT displays, the system may not function. Contact authorized dealer. \nIf BLIND SPOT NOT AVAILABLE/SENSOR BLOCKED SEE MANUAL or CROSS TRAFFIC NOT AVAILABLE/SENSOR BLOCKED SEE MANUAL displays, check exterior vehicle sensors for damage or debris covering them (see Owner\'s Manual for sensor locations). If the problem persists, your vehicle requires diagnosis by a technician. Please contact an authorized dealer.\nSee your Owner\'s Manual.
Blind Spot Detection with Cross Traffic
Please ensure your vehicle\'s parking brake is released. If the light remains on, the brake system should be inspected ASAP by an authorized dealer.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.
There is an electrical system fault. Please switch off all non-essential electrical equipment and contact an authorized dealer for service.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

Your fuel cap may be loose. At the next safe opportunity, please pull off the road and reinstall it. If your vehicle has a capless fuel system, please inspect the fuel inlet to ensure it has closed properly.\nWARNING: The fuel system may be under pressure. If the fuel filler cap is venting vapor or if you hear a hissing sound, wait until it stops before completely removing the cap. Otherwise, fuel may spray out and injure you or others. If the warning stays on or continues to turn on while your vehicle is running, contact authorized dealer.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

The fuel inlet may have stuck open or debris may be preventing the inlet from fully closing. At the next opportunity, safely pull off the road, turn off the engine, open the fuel filler door and remove any visible debris from the fuel fill opening by either inserting a fuel fill nozzle or funnel into the inlet until cleared.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.
The diesel exhaust fuel level is low and must be replenished in order to operate properly. Please contact your authorized dealer.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

A contamination was detected in the diesel exhaust fluid. Catalytic reduction systems which serve to reduce exhaust emissions are sensitive to such contamination. Please contact your authorized dealer.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

The vehicle exhaust system temperature exceeds intended operating range. If Stop Safely Now displays and a chime sounds, engine power is reduced and the engine will shut down below 3mph (5 km/h) and may not restart, depending on the severity of the condition. Please stop your vehicle as soon as possible and contact your authorized dealer. Please see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

If the Trailer Disconnected message is on: please stop the vehicle as soon as it is safe to do so, switch off the engine and check the trailer connections.
If the Wiring Fault On Trailer message is on with no trailer connected, please contact your authorized dealer. If the trailer is connected, please consult your trailer dealer or repair facility for assistance.
If the Trailer Brake Module Fault message is on: Contact your authorized dealer.
See your Owner's Manual.
Please see your Owner's Manual for reference.

An engine overheat condition was detected. Please stop your vehicle as soon as it is safe to do so and switch off the engine. Let the engine cool and check the coolant level. If the warning stays on after your vehicle warms up, please contact an authorized dealer ASAP.\nWARNING: Never remove the coolant reservoir cap while the engine is running or hot.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

The collision warning system has detected either a system fault or blocked sensor. Please clean the grille surface in front of the sensor or remove the obstruction. If the message does not clear after several minutes, please contact your authorized dealer. Please see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.
The fuel door is not closed properly. At the next opportunity, safely pull off the road and close the fuel door.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

A fault has been detected with one or more of the electrical system components. Your vehicle may shut down without warning. Please stop your vehicle as soon as safely possible and attempt to restart it. If the fault remains, please contact your authorized dealer ASAP.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

A Hybrid system component fault has caused your vehicle to shut down. Your vehicle may require refueling, jump starting, resetting of the shutoff switches or service. Please refer to the Roadside Emergencies chapter in your Owner\'s Manual for more information.

A fault has been detected in one or more of the Hill Descent Control, Anti-Lock Brake or Roll Stability Control systems. The Hill Descent Control system has been deactivated. You must apply the brakes manually as needed in order to maintain a safe speed. If the fault continues to display, please contact an authorized dealer for service.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

The Hill Start Assist System has detected a failure. Hill start assist will not be activated when you start from a slope. Please contact your authorized dealer ASAP.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

2013 ESCAPE OWNERS: PLEASE DISREGARD THIS MESSAGE.
The Lane Keeping system has detected a system fault or an obstructed front camera. 
If the LANE KEEPING AID MALFUNCTION SERVICE REQUIRED or FRONT CAMERA MALFUNCTION SERVICE REQUIRED warning is on, please contact your authorized dealer.
FRONT CAMERA TEMPORARILY NOT AVAILABLE on: please wait for the system to cool before switching it on.
FRONT CAMERA LOW VISIBILITY CLEAN SCREEN on: please check the windshield in front of the camera (behind the interior mirror) and remove any possible debris.
Please see your Owner's Manual for reference.

NOTE TO 2015 FORD FUSION AND 2015 LINCOLN MKZ OWNERS: PLEASE DISREGARD THIS MESSAGE. IT IS UNLIKELY THAT YOU HAVE A BURNED-OUT EXTERIOR BULB. HOWEVER, WE RECOMMEND THAT YOU INSPECT YOUR VEHICLE EXTERIOR LAMPS AT EVERY SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE INTERVAL.\nA burned out bulb or an electrical system fault in the exterior lamp system has been detected. Please check all exterior bulbs and connectors and contact your authorized dealer if the message persists. Please see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

The engine oil pressure is low. Please stop your vehicle as soon as it is safe to do so and switch off the engine. Check the oil level and add oil if needed. If the warning persists, your engine may require service; please switch off the vehicle and contact an authorized dealer ASAP.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

An engine malfunction has been detected.\nWARNING: Under engine misfire conditions, excessive exhaust temperatures could damage critical vehicle components and is a potential fire hazard. Please contact your authorized dealer as soon as possible.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

The parking aid system has detected obstructions. Please clean the front and rear bumper covers or remove the obstruction. If the message does not clear, please contact your authorized dealer.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.
A powertrain, all-wheel drive or four-wheel drive fault has been detected. Please have the system inspected by an authorized dealer.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

The Restraints Control Module has detected a fault with the supplementary restraint system which includes the air bags and seat belt buckle pretensioners. Please contact your authorized dealer ASAP.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

POWER STEERING ASSIST FAULT or STEERING MALFUNCTION STOP SAFELY: Stop vehicle in safe place and switch off for at least 10 seconds. Restart. If message returns, contact authorized dealer.
SERVICE POWER STEERING: If you switch vehicle off and then switch it on again, the message SERVICE POWER STEERING or STEERING MALFUNCTION SERVICE NOW displays. Contact authorized dealer.
SERVICE POWER STEERING NOW or STEERING MALFUNCTION SERVICE NOW: Contact authorized dealer.
See your Owner's Manual.

A start-stop system or powertrain malfunction has been detected and the start-stop system has been turned off. If your engine has stopped, please restart it. Your fuel consumption may increase while the start-stop system is unavailable. Please contact your authorized dealer ASAP.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

One or more of your tires may be significantly under-inflated or there is a tire pressure monitoring system malfunction. Please check your tire pressure ASAP.\nWARNING: The Tire Pressure Monitoring System is NOT a substitute for manually checking tire pressure. The tire pressure should be checked periodically (at least monthly) using a tire gauge. Failure to properly maintain your tire pressure could increase the risk of tire failure, loss of control, vehicle rollover and personal injury.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual for reference.

Safely stop your vehicle as soon as possible, shut off the engine, then drain the Diesel Fuel Conditioner Module (DFCM). \nWARNING: Do not drain the water separator while the engine is running. Fuel may ignite if the separator is drained while the engine is running or the vehicle is moving.\nPlease see your Owner\'s Manual or Owner\'s Manual diesel supplement for the drain procedure.
Welcome to a smarter way to move
Find best parking options before starting your journey.
Know and control your car from the palm of your hand.
And get one-on-one help from real people.
Ensure your vehicle is parked in an open space, start your vehicle and accept the authorization notification that appears on the in-vehicle touchscreen.
Before activation can be completed, a waiting period will begin and last approximately 24 hours. This waiting period is for security purposes and to validate vehicle ownership.
Once the waiting period is completed, start your vehicle and accept the activation notification on the in-vehicle touchscreen for a second time to complete the activation process.
Your activation will be completed once an authorized user approves your request.
Another device is currently in the activation process causing any new activations to be unavailable right now. Check back later to try again.
Just start your vehicle and accept the activation confirmation on the in-vehicle touchscreen to unlock all of its FordPass features.

Check here to receive communications, including emails, from Ford Motor Company of Canada, Limited (Ford of Canada), The Lincoln Motor Company* (Lincoln), FordPass*, and your authorized dealership about them and their products, services, events, news, updates, offers, promotions, personalized ads and more. You agree that we can use and combine your personal information, including vehicle, location, account and device information and information about your use of the App, to better understand your preferences and personalize these communications and to improve and develop new products and services. Ford of Canada is seeking consent on its own behalf and on behalf of your authorized dealership. For more information about and how to contact your authorized dealership, please %s. Contact us at 1-800-565-FORD (3673) or write us at The Canadian Road P.O. Box 2000, Oakville, Ontario, Canada L6K 0C8. You may withdraw consent at any time though we will continue to send you communications where permitted by law, including related to the FordPass App. 


* Ford Motor Company of Canada, Limited carries on business as The Lincoln Motor Company and FordPass.
If you would like to hear about other great opportunities from Ford and your local dealer that maybe of interest you, please check here.

FordPass already provides communications to your mobile device and through email to improve your experience with App features, such as letting you know about new App services, vehicle health notifications, and MyPerks opportunities. For more information about these communications, please see the Terms and Privacy Policy.

A recall is an action by the Company to remedy a safety concern related to a vehicle defect or regulatory requirement. It may require that you return your vehicle to the dealer for service. If your vehicle is not affected, it may be because it was built at a different time or using a different part than the affected vehicles.\n\nBe advised that this system tracks safety and emissions recalls for which vehicles are subject to repair in the United States. The information provided is subject to change and update. There may be temporary delays in update of information on this site due to a number of factors. For the latest information regarding the status of your vehicle or any recall program of Ford Motor Company, please contact your local dealership directly or the Customer Relationship Center.

A Recall is an action by the Company to remedy a Safety, Emissions or Compliance issue with respect to a vehicle. A Safety Recall is implemented to address a vehicle defect that affects or is likely to affect the safety of any person. An Emissions Recall or a Compliance Recall is implemented to address non-compliance with prescribed regulatory standards. A Customer Satisfaction Program is an action by the Company to provide additional coverage or repairs as part of the Company\'s commitment to building a community of happy, satisfied customers. Recalls or Customer Satisfaction Programs may require that you return your vehicle to a Ford or Lincoln dealer for service or repair. If your vehicle is not affected by a particular Recall or Customer Satisfaction Program, it may be because it was built at a different time or using a different part than the affected vehicles.\n\nThis system tracks Recalls and Customer Satisfaction Programs applicable to Ford and Lincoln vehicles. The information provided is subject to change and update. There may be delays in the updating of information on this site due to a number of factors. For the latest information regarding any Recall or Customer Satisfaction Program applicable to your vehicle, please contact your local Ford or Lincoln dealership directly or the Ford of Canada Customer Relationship Centre at 1-800-565-3673 or 1-888-658-6805 (TDD for the Hearing Impaired).
Our system cannot accept a partial address. Please fill out the remaining forms.*

*You can choose not to share your address, however, providing this information will make it easier for us to link your Ford accounts.\n\nNote: If adding your address, all fields are required. If you wish to remove your address, you must delete all address fields.
Adding your information is optional, but doing so will make it easier for us to link your Ford accounts and keep all your information securely in one place.
Authorizing your vehicle allows you to use remote features such as lock/unlock and remote starts.
In case of an emergency please dial 9-1-1

Did your battery go dead? Roadside Assistance will give your vehicle the jump-start it needs.
Roadside Assistance will change your tire for you. Tire change service requires the customer to have a usable spare tire.
We\'ll bring the gas to you. Limited to 2, no-change occurrences within a 12-month period (2 gallons of gasoline or 5 gallons of diesel fuel).
We\'ll get you back in fast. Key replacement cost is your responsibility.
Just make the call and we\'ll be there to tow your car.

1) Press the *apps_icon* Apps icon in the Feature bar at the bottom of your touchscreen.
3) If a popup appears asking you \"Would you like to enable mobile apps on SYNC?\" press Yes.
4) If a popup appears asking you to enable permissions, press Yes.

Our Guides are available from 7AM to 9PM, Monday-Sunday. Please try again during that time and we\'ll be happy to help you!
Our Guides are available from 8AM to 8PM, Monday-Sunday. Please try again during that time and we\'ll be happy to help you!
The most powerful set of keys you\'ve ever owned lives on your phone.
Start, lock and unlock your car from your phone, and keep track of your vehicle\'s vital signs.

FordPass will pair with your SatNav system to deliver real-time traffic updates every 3 minutes and to an accuracy of 100 metres.
Connect to your vehicle using Bluetooth
Live Traffic for SYNC® enabled.\nNow connect to SYNC®
Ensure you\'re parked and turn your vehicle on to begin.
Select Settings from your in-vehicle menu, then select SYNC Connect Settings.
From SYNC Connect Settings, select Connectivity Settings to make your updates. To access all FordPass features, ensure all Connectivity Settings are enabled.
Press the Try Connecting Again button on the previous screen in the app. Please note this refresh could take up to 30 seconds.
Get Live Traffic data delivered to your vehicle, via either in-car modem or connected device.
We received your cancellation request and your refund should be making its way to you soon!

*zh* If your vehicle has been idling in Park (P) or Neutral (N) for five minutes (with the parking brake set) or 15 minutes (if the parking brake is not set), your vehicle will turn off within 30 seconds of receiving this message (per regulatory state requirement). Please consult your Owner\'s Manual for more information or contact your authorized dealer for assistance.
*zh* Adaptive cruise control is on. See Owner\'s Manual.
*zh* One or more of the seatbelts are not fastened. See Owner\'s Manual.
Sorry, it looks like Wi-Fi has been disabled from this vehicle. If you need help, please contact a FordGuide for assistance.
Turn your vehicle into a Wi-Fi Hotspot with an active data plan through your vehicle\'s wireless provider. Follow the link below to set up a data plan with your vehicle\'s wireless provider.
Turn your vehicle into a Wi-Fi Hotspot with an active data plan through your vehicle\'s wireless provider. Follow the link to learn more about the Complimentary Trial.

Turn your vehicle into a Wi-Fi Hotspot. Follow the link below to set up a data plan or manage your account online with your vehicle\'s wireless provider. Once your vehicle activation is complete, you will be able to view your vehicle\'s usage with FordPass.
Learn More About the Complimentary Trial

Search for Parking Before You Go
Search for spots, marked with the pricing information, to know where to park ahead of time.
Color coding shows you the range of available parking.
Pin where you parked and we\'ll guide you back to your vehicle.
Do not use as a tire pressure gauge

It may take up to 2 minutes of driving over 20 mph for the tire pressure monitoring system to update after you have filled your tires.\n\nDo not use the tire pressure display as a gauge as this could result in over-filling or under-filling a tire and may lead to personal injury and/or damage to the tire.

The tire pressure when the vehicle has been stationary and out of direct sunlight for an hour or more and prior to the vehicle being driven for 1 mile (1.6 km).

• If tires are warm, add 2–4psi to the recommended cold tire inflation pressure.

• Tire pressures must be set to specification when tires are at outdoor ambient temperatures. If the vehicle is allowed to warm up to shop temperatures, and the outside temperature is less than shop temperature, the tire inflation pressure must be adjusted accordingly.
Learn more about proper tire care on the Ford Owner site.
You have added a FordPass Connect Vehicle
Before you can use FordPass Connect vehicles, please ensure that you have successfully completed your Real Name Registration.
Make the journey worth your while.
As a FordPass member, you\'ll enjoy smarter ways to move.
Share your digital perks to WeChat by viewing your badge details.
Access your vehicle information and maintenance schedule in one convenient spot.
Set a preferred Ford dealer for your vehicles so you can quickly refer to and call your Ford dealership.
Need help? A team of knowledgeable FordGuides are just a phone call away.
Find parking in parking garages and lots in 20+ major cities.
Stay tuned to discover how your FordPass membership will grow to meet the road ahead.
Please install WeChat or upgrade to the most recent version to share sticker.

You\’ll only be able to enjoy the functions of FordPass Connect upon completing your Real Name Registration*.

You'll need to provide your official ID information and photograph, please have these with you as you complete the registration.

You can complete your Real Name Registration at your Dealer or; on the China Unicom website or WeChat (WeChat ID: CUSC_RNR).
*Due to regulations, your embedded modem may be deactivated at any time if you’ve not completed your Real Name Registration.
You already have an existing registered user profile with this phone number, please update your information to continue.
Sorry, data cannot refresh while vehicle is in Deep Sleep mode. To deactivate Deep Sleep mode, simply turn on your vehicle manually.
Your vehicle is in Deep Sleep mode and Vehicle Controls are temporarily unavailable. To deactivate Deep Sleep mode, simply turn on your vehicle manually.
Sorry, vehicle location cannot be determined while in Deep Sleep mode. To deactivate Deep Sleep mode, simply turn on your vehicle manually.
Unavailable While in Deep Sleep Mode
Would you like to schedule your servicing appointment with a vehicle not listed above?
Select a province, and ensure that your license plate number is a total of 6 alphanumeric characters
Does your vehicle need care? We’ve partnered with eDaijia to pick up your vehicle and handle it from start to finish so you can get back to what matters.
All your auto repair and maintenance needs are taken care of from quote to service to drop off with participating dealers.
Our trustworthy team of drivers and a secure handover process lets you know your vehicle is in good hands.
Are you sure you want to cancel your appointment?
The refund for your request has been initiated. If you have any questions about your refund, please contact the Guides.
Your order has been cancelled. If you still require a Service Pickup and Delivery request, please Reschedule below.
Before you can request a Servicing with Pickup and Delivery, you must first add a vehicle to My Vehicles.
We will be launching the FordPass Service Pickup & Delivery in Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Chengdu, Nanjing, Suzhou, and many other cities in the future. Keep your app updated and check back here!
This price includes the driver pickup from your pickup location to your selected Dealer.

The total driver fee will be processed when you submit your request. Return service can be added after you\'ve completed your servicing at the dealer. You may cancel at any time before your driver is dispatched and you will receive a full refund.
This price includes the driver pickup from your dealer to your return location.
You may cancel at any time before your driver is dispatched and you will receive a full refund.
Sorry, we only provide Pickup & Delivery service within the city where the dealer is located. Please modify your pickup location or choose another dealer.
No Result. Please modify your input or go back to the map to pin your location
No results. Please search a different city or province using the dropdown.
Request service from a dealer, get a quote and pay for your servicing.

By submitting your request, you are agreeing to eDaijia\'s Driver Service. Your selected payment method will be used to process this request. You may change this payment method for dealer servicing later.
Please add a payment method before submitting your pickup request.
Inspect the exterior of your vehicle with your driver to ensure your car is returned just like you left it.
Your driver will also inspect the interior of the vehicle and make note on any items in the car.
Inform your driver of any special requests.
Note: Please do not leave any valuables in the vehicle when handing over your car

This fee is determined by the Dealer. Please contact the dealer regarding any questions or changes about the quotation. You may also contact the Dealer if you have questions after your vehicle\'s servicing has been completed.
Check here for additional payment information and refund details.
Please add a payment method before submitting your request.
We were unable to process your payment due to an insufficient balance. Please try again.
We were unable to process your payment. Your card might be expired. Please try again.
Please pick up your vehicle from your dealer at:
Go to Dealer for Self Pickup

Your servicing request has been submitted. The dealer will confirm your request within one hour or at their earliest opening time.
You may cancel your Service Pickup and Delivery request any time until the driver is on the way to pickup your vehicle. After which, cancellation will not be allowed.
